topic: Dataset Prompt Template Design

  entities:
    Dataset Prompt Template|Toolkit
    Ethics|Dataset
    NormBank|Dataset
    Moral Stories|Dataset
    CultureBank|Dataset

  proposition: Dataset Prompt Template Characteristics
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Dataset Prompt Template|DESIGNED_FOR|scenario generation
    Dataset Prompt Template|FOCUS_ON|ethical scenarios
    Dataset Prompt Template|FOCUS_ON|cultural scenarios
    Dataset Prompt Template|FOCUS_ON|behavioral scenarios

  proposition: Dataset Prompt Template Components
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Dataset Prompt Template|CONTAINS|scenario description
    Dataset Prompt Template|CONTAINS|specific action
    Dataset Prompt Template|CONTAINS|action options
    Dataset Prompt Template|CONTAINS|ethical judgment basis
    Dataset Prompt Template|CONTAINS|evaluation question

  proposition: Dataset Types
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Ethics|SIZE|400
    NormBank|SIZE|1110
    Moral Stories|SIZE|1111
    CultureBank|SIZE|401

  proposition: Prompt Template Generation Principles
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Dataset Prompt Template|CHARACTERISTIC|concise
    Dataset Prompt Template|CHARACTERISTIC|relevant
    Dataset Prompt Template|AVOID|additional context
    Dataset Prompt Template|AVOID|background information

  proposition: Prompt Template Structural Guidelines
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Dataset Prompt Template|PERSPECTIVE|first-person
    Dataset Prompt Template|REQUIRES|clear action options
    Dataset Prompt Template|REQUIRES|specific evaluation question
    Dataset Prompt Template|REQUIRES|consistency
    Dataset Prompt Template|AVOID|prefixes
    Dataset Prompt Template|AVOID|explanatory text
